readable.content: A lady and her little girl are holding hands and walking up the sidewalk . A mother and child run hand in hand through Chinatown in an American City . a woman and a child both wearing red outfits walking up a street Child in red holding the hand of person in red coat walking on sidewalk under awnings . woman and little girl wearing red in Asian area
